name: Last Mile (kurrik)
description:
Global supply chain issues have caused a huge backlog of undelivered packages to pile up! Jump in your trusty delivery van and see if you can get these packages through the last mile of their delivery to houses in your neighborhood!

Last Mile is a Ludum Dare game developed over the course of a weekend by @kurrik and @KalevRK.  All models, images, sounds and gameplay were created as part of this jam.

Changelog
========

  • 1.0.1
    • Reduced quality settings for WebGL for smoother playback.
    • Fixed a bug loading more dispatcher messages in WebGL.
  • 1.0.0
    • Initial release.
